movies.title: Astu - So Be It
movies.plot: Astu - So BE IT is a feature film with duration 123 Min's .The film revolves around Mr. Shastri, a retired Sanskrit professor who in due course suffers with Alzheimer's goes missing while travelling with his daughter .during this time of missing he gets fascinated with a elephant walking on street and goes to stay with the family which owns elephant. The film is inter cut to depict the human side of relationships with social message in end that only care and affection is medicine for Alzheimer's and there is no other cure for the same.
movies.simplePlot: A Sanskrit Professor, suffering from Alzheimer's disease, sees an elephant on the street. Fascinated with the creature, he follows it home, and is cared for by the family to whom the elephant belongs.

biography.bio: Mohan Agashe was born on July 23, 1947 in Bhor, Bombay Presidency, British India. He is an actor and producer, known for Gandhi (1982), Ab Tak Chhappan (2004) and Jolly LLB (2013).
biography.name: Mohan Agashe

biography.bio: Ila Bhatey is an actress, known for Coffee Ani Barach Kahi (2015), Mrugjal... Ek Naslela Astitva (2000) and Vazir (1994).
biography.name: Ila Bhatey

biography.bio: Om Bhutkar is an actor, known for Lathe Joshi, Chintoo (2012) and Ajoba (2014).
biography.name: Om Bhutkar

biography.bio: Devika Daftardar is an actress, known for Nital (2006), Devrai (2004) and Nirop (2007).
biography.name: Devika Daftardar

biography.bio: Iravati Harshe is an actress, known for Hey Ram (2000), Hate Story (2012) and Mousson Rouge (2013).
biography.name: Iravati Harshe

biography.bio: Aditi Kulkarni is an actor, known for Astu - So Be It (2013).
biography.name: Aditi Kulkarni

biography.bio: Shekhar Kulkarni is an actor, known for Nital (2006) and Astu - So Be It (2013).
biography.name: Shekhar Kulkarni

biography.bio: Nachiket Purnapatre is an actor, known for Kaminey (2009), Rocky Handsome (2016) and Astu - So Be It (2013).
biography.name: Nachiket Purnapatre

biography.bio: Tejas Rao is an actor, known for Astu - So Be It (2013).
biography.name: Tejas Rao

biography.bio: Milind Soman was born on November 4, 1965 in Scotland. He is an actor and producer, known for Bajirao Mastani (2015), Bheja Fry (2007) and La vallée des fleurs (2006). He was previously married to Mylène Jampanoï.
biography.name: Milind Soman

biography.bio: Amruta Subhash is acclaimed Marathi actress who has appeared in many 'Class' movies. She is well known for her role in Shwaas as Medical Social Worker and in Killa as Mother. She is often praised for portraying variety of characters with ease and simplicity. She has appeared in art films more than commercial films.
biography.name: Amruta Subhash

biography.bio: Jyoti Subhash is an actress, known for Aiyyaa (2012), Maudite pluie! (2009) and Dahavi pha (2002).
biography.name: Jyoti Subhash
